text:
Days Recap: Judge Fitzpatrick gives Hope good news about her future 
Christine Fix Wednesday, February 22nd, 2017 
Wednesday February 22, 2017: Gabi and Chad discuss what happened in the meat locker, Marlena begs Eric to come home, and Hope gets good news about her case. Pin 
Marlena goes to Eric at his house, without words, she asks for a hug. He hugs her, silently, and she cries at how proud of him she is. He turns away. She wants him to come home. He raises his voice, "No Mom, I'm not!" Marlena knows his guilt is crushing him. She wants to help him stop running and hiding. He has a second chance. Eric argues that he didn't ask to be pardoned. "I still belong in prison." She tells him he has made his own prison here. Eric yells that he got drunk and took a life, the life of a man with a family. Marlena says he has a family, too. They miss him and she's not leaving there without him. She reminds him God forgives. He has made up his mind. If Daniel could come home to his family, he would, too. Marlena leaves things for now. "This is not over," she promises. She'll love him until he loves himself. She tries to hug him but he pushes her away. Once she's gone, he tells her he loves her. 
New: Soap opera alum guest stars on Harry this week 
In the park, Hope tells Rafe how good it feels to be free. She says she still shot Stefano and must prove she didn't escape prison. Rafe assures her all will go well, and they kiss. 
Chad's awake in the hospital when Andre visits. He's relieved his brother will be making a full recovery and tells him that Abigail saved his and Gabi's lives. Chad says, "Gabi." Andre tells him the Orwell device has been destroyed. Chad's glad. They need to stop the fighting between families. Meanwhile, Gabi wakes up with a start and yells, "Arianna!" Eduardo calms her down. Ari's fine. Gabi cries that she was so afraid and Chad helped calm her. Eduardo can tell she loves him. She doesn't want to talk about it. He goes and she gets out of bed and walks to Chad's room, where he's flashing back to kissing her in the meat locker. She barely remembers much about being held. They both remember professing their love for one another and kissing. Gabi asks what it means. Chad can't stop thinking about it. 
Hope and Rafe meet Justin at the pub. He tells them he and Hope will be meeting DA Trask and the judge in her chambers about Hope's case today. He suspects Andre won't let Hope's case go without trying something. Rafe says if he does, they'll nail him for embezzlement and framing Hattie. Suddenly, Andre walks in with Melissa Trask and everyone's eyes widen. Justin says he'll mention this display to the judge. Hope kisses Rafe and goes off with Justin. Trask leaves and Andre approaches Rafe and taunts him. Rafe wants to know what he was doing with Trask. "Chit chat," Andre mutters. 
New: Hallmark's Chesapeake Shores season two airdate 
Justin and Hope meet with Trask and Judge Fitzpatrick in her chambers. Everyone has gone over Hope's case. Trask talks about Hope's felonies - shooting a man in cold blood and escaping prison. Justin argues that Stefano dared Hope to shoot him, knowing he was dying. Trask scoffs. What about the escape? Justin says they know she wasn't a willing participant in that. He tells Fitzpatrick that Andre had a meeting with Trask, earlier. Trask says Andre didn't want new charges filed. He wants to move on. So do they. Fitzpatrick releases her. Hope cries in Justin's arms and thanks them. 
Rafe arrives at the hospital to see Gabi. "It's good to see you both feeling better," he says before taking Gabi aside. He says he came to see her last night but she was asleep. They hug. Rafe admits he overheard Gabs and Chad talking about kissing. "He's a married man," Rafe reminds her. She knows. It was confusing but she does love him. Rafe reminds her of the families feuding and assures that it'll only get worse. 
New: Soap alum Nathan Fillion to comedy show, Brooklyn Nine-Nine 
Back at the hospital, Rafe leaves and Gabi goes back to Chad. She basically tells him that everything that happened in the meat locker stays in the meat locker, then runs off with him calling out to her. Andre returns. Chad says he needs to be honest with Abigail about what happened in the meat locker. Meanwhile, Eduardo takes Arianna to see her mother. 
Marlena arrives at the pub and calls someone to talk in person - about Eric. 
Rafe leads Hope to the park where he has a romantic picnic set up for her. She loves it and cries tears of joy.
